text: Papa Niang (born 5 December 1988) is a Senegalese football player, who plays as a forward for FF Jaro. He is the younger brother of Mamadou Niang. ==External links== * * Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Senegalese footballers Category:Senegalese expatriate footballers Category:Veikkausliiga players Category:Kazakhstan Premier League players Category:AC Oulu players Category:FF Jaro players Category:FC Vostok players Category:Expatriate footballers in Finland Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan Category:Expatriate footballers in Kuwait Category:Expatriate footballers in Gabon Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Finland Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Kazakhstan Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Kuwait Category:Senegalese expatriate sportspeople in Gabon Category:Association football wingers
title: Papa Niang
